abstract: Distorts an image by increasing the distance of the center of the image.

codeExamples.code:
func circularWrap(inputImage: CIImage) -> CIImage {    let filter = CIFilter.circularWrap()
    filter.inputImage = inputImage
    filter.center = CGPoint(
        x: inputImage.extent.size.width/2,
        y: inputImage.extent.size.height/2
    )
    filter.angle = .pi
    filter.radius = 90
    return filter.outputImage!
}

let text = CIFilter.textImageGenerator()
text.text = "Core Image"
text.fontSize = 100
text.fontName = "Chalkboard"
text.outputImage!
circularWrap(inputImage: text.outputImage!)

# circularWrap()

**Type Method**

Distorts an image by increasing the distance of the center of the image.

## Declaration

```swift
class func circularWrap() -> any CIFilter & CICircularWrap
```

## Return Value

The distorted image.

## Discussion

This method applies the circular wrap filter to an image. This effect wraps an image around a transparent circle. The distortion of the image increases with the distance from the center of the circle.

The circular wrap filter uses the following properties:



The following code creates a filter that results in a circular image generated from the input image:

```swift
func circularWrap(inputImage: CIImage) -> CIImage {    let filter = CIFilter.circularWrap()
    filter.inputImage = inputImage
    filter.center = CGPoint(
        x: inputImage.extent.size.width/2,
        y: inputImage.extent.size.height/2
    )
    filter.angle = .pi
    filter.radius = 90
    return filter.outputImage!
}

let text = CIFilter.textImageGenerator()
text.text = "Core Image"
text.fontSize = 100
text.fontName = "Chalkboard"
text.outputImage!
circularWrap(inputImage: text.outputImage!)
```



## Filters

- **bumpDistortion()**: Distorts an image with a concave or convex bump.
- **bumpDistortionLinear()**: Linearly distorts an image with a concave or convex bump.
- **circleSplashDistortion()**: Distorts an image with radiating circles to the periphery of the image.
- **displacementDistortion()**: Applies the grayscale values of the second image to the first image.
- **droste()**: Stylizes an image with the Droste effect.
- **glassDistortion()**: Distorts an image by applying a glass-like texture.
- **glassLozenge()**: Creates a lozenge-shaped lens and distorts the image.
- **holeDistortion()**: Distorts an image with a circular area that pushes the image outward.
- **lightTunnel()**: Distorts an image by generating a light tunnel.
- **ninePartStretched()**: Distorts an image by stretching it between two breakpoints.
- **ninePartTiled()**: Distorts an image by tiling portions of it.
- **pinchDistortion()**: Distorts an image by creating a pinch effect with stronger distortion in the center.
- **stretchCrop()**: Distorts an image by stretching or cropping to fit a specified size.
- **torusLensDistortion()**: Creates a torus-shaped lens to distort the image.
- **twirlDistortion()**: Distorts an image by rotating pixels around a center point.
